name: Swing (itch) (BradCox)
description:
Swing is a 3D gravity golf, puzzler. 

Imagine your a little ball, now imagine you are that same little ball but your stuck in a Russian constructionist art gallery and your being hit by hammers through the different gallery works. These hammers smash you of walls and the floor over and over....

Psych! you were the hammers the whole time now let's make that little ball suffer.

Time to make some art!

I have been working on this game for almost 4 months. I has a 3D art style that is heavily inspired by the "Russian Constructionist" movement.  This game is inspired by the joy or game play and game design.

In this game the players uses "B" to move the hammers and "Space" to reset the level.

With 11 unique levels, Swing is a fun engaging experience that allows you to just turn off your brain and have fun again.

If you like the look of this game and you want to know more about me you can visit my socials 

Twitter- https://twitter.com/xocdarb

Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/xocdarb

Vimeo-  https://vimeo.com/user88229888
